Title: Relates to coverage for services provided by school-based health centers for medical assistance recipients
Summary: Ensures services provided in school-based health centers are not provided to medical assistance recipients through managed care programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง364-j, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to coverage for services provided by school-based health centers for medical assistance recipients
